Package polimi.reds.broker.routing

Interface Summary
Reconfigurator In a REDS broker the Reconfigurator is the module in charge of managing the dispatching network in presence of reconfigurations.
ReplyManager It is the module which manages the replies.
ReplyTable This is a data structure to manage the repliable messages and theirs replies.
Router This interface is the "core" of a REDS broker.
RoutingStrategy In a REDS broker the RoutingStrategy is the module in charge of managing the routing of messages on top of the overlay network (which is realized by the Overlay and maintained, in presence of reconfiguration, by the ConnectionManager.
SubscriptionTable A SubscriptionTable is used by the REDS broker to store information about the subscriptions (i.e., filters) it received from its neighbors.
 

Class Summary
DeferredUnsubscriptionReconfigurator This class handles reconfigurations using the Timed Deferred Unsubscription or the Notified Deferred Unsubscription protocol.
FutureInt It contains an int value that can be set in a delayed instant.
GenericRouter As its name suggests, this class implements a simple Router for a REDS broker.
GenericTable A SubscriptionTable is used by the REDS broker to store information about the subscriptions (i.e., filters) it received from its neighbors.
HashReplyTable This is a implementation of ReplyTable using an Hashtable.
ImmediateForwardReplyManager This is the basic implementation of the ReplyManager.
InformedLinkActivationReconfigurator This class handles reconfigurations using the Informed Link Activation protocol.
SubscriptionForwardingRoutingStrategy This class implements a subscription forwarding routing strategy among a set of brokers connected in an unrooted tree.
